meanings.definition: The state or quality of being curly.
meanings.sent1: Her hair's natural curliness made it difficult to straighten.
meanings.sent2: I love the curliness of her hair; it's so unique.
meanings.sent3: The poodle's extreme curliness always made the other dogs jealous.
meanings.sent4: The curliness of the vines in the garden created a whimsical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's joy was evident in the bouncy curliness of her hair.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is curly.
meanings.sent1: The tight curliness of the ribbon added a nice touch to the gift.
meanings.sent2: I prefer a medium curliness in my hair; not too tight, not too loose.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated curliness of the phone cord always made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The curliness of the waves in the ocean seemed to dance under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the perfect curliness of the sheep's wool in the painting.
